tutorial1:
Touch the Left and Right Arrow Keys to move
You can use the whole screen area above the keys
tutorial2: Touch the Up Arrow Key to jump
tutorial4: Grab the green hat to transform into the Dragon Kid!
tutorial5:
Touch the Up Arrow Key while jumping
to double jump
tutorial6: Touch the Shoot Key to throw fireballs at your enemies!
tutorial7: Jump on your enemies to defeat them

last_level:
This is it...for now!
Thank you for playing!
